translations: 建议，劝告（做……）；为……提供咨询，给……提供建议；商讨，提出忠告（counsel 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Psychological counsellings include individual counsellings and group counsellings. Activities are used more often in group counsellings, and finger gymnastic is one of the activities.
sentences.translation: 心理咨询包括个体咨询和团体咨询。在团体咨询里，以活动居多，手指操是其中的一个活动形式。
